Intuit QuickBooks
Let’s connect, {!Opportunity.Primary_Contact__c}!
You would hate to miss out on what we have in store for you.
Dear {!Opportunity.Primary_Contact__c}, My name is {!User.FirstName}, your dedicated QuickBooks consultant. As you’re interested in QuickBooks and have signed up for a free trial, I tried to contact you but were unable to reach you. Feel free to connect back and I would love to provide you with an online demonstration of QuickBooks. QuickBooks is the world’s #1 online accounting software with 1.5 million subscribers worldwide. It is designed for small businesses, like yours, to help you:
Get paid faster with easy invoicing Create invoices, email them to customers and track payments
Save time in managing your books of accounts Mobile apps on iOS and Android, online banking integration and integrated payroll
Stay in control of your business with real-time insights Monitor business performance, balance sheets, P&L and tax reports with a click
Please feel free to give me a call or write to me – my contact details are given below. Looking forward to speaking with you soon!
{!User.Name} Quickbooks Consultant {!User.MobilePhone} {!User.Email} You can also call our small business helpline at 1800 102 5599 (Toll free. Mon-Sat, 9:30am – 6pm)
The terms and conditions of pricing for purchase and renewal of QuickBooks subscriptions may change without prior notice. Intuit respects your privacy. To learn more, read our Privacy Statement. If you receive a suspicious email, please report it. Visit Security to find more. © Intuit India Software Solutions Pvt. Ltd.
